snippet.title: Good Heavens! - Official Trailer - Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023 (Freedom Games)
snippet.description: Learn about Good Heavens!, get a look at its world, and more in this latest trailer for the upcoming procedurally generated open-world crafting RPG for 1-8 players. In Good Heavens!, be a farmer, hunter, trader, or warrior and explore the promised lands full of different races and cultures. Lead the heavens to salvation or who cares, find the best werewolf tavern and get drunk. Good Heavens! will be available on PC.
